name: PSH - Pray, Shop, n Hunt
description:
Your a hunter and in this Game you have 2-4 chars unlocked depending if your playing a demo or not, now you will  increase your Smarts aka your brain, anyways you get Exp from Smarts for Actions you have to spend them on Hunts, hunts is your Chance to find a rabbit and not shoot your foot.

Game is over if you kill your Foot. Cuz honestly Hobbling around isn't catching that fast rabbit and besides your precious life fluids only last so long, also Game is over if you rip the game off of Exp too many times, the game is lenient but c'mon you know also btw, jail times are insanity if caught.

Praying gets you actions at the "HUGE" expense of Exp

What to expect in jail well... 2 hours+ of wasted potential, in the Non-Demo the Jail time is only 5-10 Mins not the 2+ hour wait. Shopping gets you stats and items in Non-Demo version.
